review: So awesome! Seriously the best streaming device available. Bought it as a replacement for my 1st generation Roku. Love the advances in the interface and speed of streaming! Highly recommend.
author: A. Doyle

review: 90% of the time it doesn't connect! I've tried different sources of internet. I id dysfunctional. I need a new one.
author: Alvena Willis

review: I had initially purchased the Roku 3. Then I heard about this. Half the price and so convenient. I returned the other one! I strongly recommend this one!
author: Explorer

review: Got this for my 80 year old in-laws, and they love it. I thought it might be asking a bit much for them to learn to use it, but they got it the first day and have never looked back. My wife and I love our Roku box, but now this does everything that does in a USB stick for half the cost. I definitely need one for work travel...
author: tehuti

review: After buying 2 roku boxes, I decided to buy a Roku stick for travel. It does not work in most name brand hotels since it can't handle hotel's authentication pages. Roku help is so poor that I will return the product and never purchase from them again.
author: Jeffrey Velasco

review: Simple, small and easy to use. Just waiting for stronger home streaming support along the lines of VLC Player. (Plex is robust but rather unwieldy.)
author: J. Sandi "uscburrito"

review: This stick buffers continuously although my smart TV does not buffer when watching videos. I bought it for the tv that is not WIFI ready.I got home too late to return it. The router was downloading fast enough for the other sets
author: Humble

review: Excellent way to smarten up a tv that doesn't have apps, but is still hdmi capable.  Don't really care for the remote, there is a smartphone app that can do the same functions.
author: Jason Zurawski

review: I bought the Roku because one of the features listed was the ability to send videos from an iOS device.  I have am iPad and have not  been able to send any videos in any of the formats listed. I was on Chat and followed every step and even tried a couple of other formats like m4v.  Movies downloaded from the Apple store would not work either. I'll throw this in my spare bedroom and get another Apple TV.
author: Patrick K. Helland "kenth57"

review: I bought this for the 2nd TV in the bedroom and it works great and the price is right.  Love it.
author: V. Myers
